Workshop 1.name: Needle Felting
Workshop 1.description: Create cute creations with this wool-y fun workshop!

Workshop 2.name: Scan Your Head!
Workshop 2.description: Learn Photogrammetry and Blender in this introduction to 3D Scanning!

Workshop 3.name: Make a Resin Jewelry Tray!
Workshop 3.description: Make a beautiful resin-based jewelry tray to hold jewelry, makeup, or anything else!

Workshop 4.name: Silver Ring Making
Workshop 4.description: Put a ring on it - yourself!
